testcase.classname: Verify that user is able to create a post/campaign from the home screen which is visible to connected patients
testcase.name: Curaprox Login with email Id South Africa Location and verify create a post/campaign from the home screen
testcase.system-out: Given Login to Curaprox for create a post...................................passed Given Home Screen open and navigate to create a post click on it............passed Given Create new campaign page open and fill all the information............passed Given Navigate to publish section and click on it...........................passed Then Click on my account option and log out for create post section.........passed
